entry.title: $1830 // Lower East Side 1 bedroom
entry.content:
Moving out of my spot to get a bigger place w/ my girlfriend. Sad to leave because this is a really great rent-controlled apartment I've been in for the last 4 years. Its way under the neighborhood average price and right on Orchard Street at Canal. Several residents are young professionals who've lived here 5-10 years. Apartment will be available Feb 1 but can likely get you in several days early if needed. Landlord lives in Queens and is great.

Apartment has a small bedroom, large kitchen, large living room, and small bathroom. One weird thing is the shower is in the kitchen (not as weird as it sounds, its kinda well hidden). There's no closets but I've purchased one of the custom Ikea Wardrobes for around $800 1.5 years ago that I can leave if wanted for a small price.

No brokers fee. Landlord will want a 1 month deposit. We can prorate if you want to move in January. Must have proof of income.
